sentence.text: In a tumor with inv(12), exon 3 of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II was fused to a sequence in intron 1 of the positive regulation of apoptotic process gene from 12q22.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In the leiomyomas with 12q rearrangements, both negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and PLAG1 were expressed whereas in the tumors with 8q aberrations, only PLAG1 was expressed.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
